executable.title: Skull Stripper for T1 MR
executable.description: Skull stripping for MR brain image with T1 contrast
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

float.name: lThreshold
float.description: Lower threshold (set to be a value between average GM intensity and average CSF intensity).
float.label: LowerThreshold

float.name: uThreshold
float.description: Upper threshold (set to be a value higher than the average WM intensity and smaller than the average intensity of brigher non brain structures).
float.label: UpperThreshold

integer.name: sphericalResolution
integer.label: Subdivisions
integer.description: Number of subdivision for surface parameterization (4002 vertices for 20)

integer.name: postDilationRadius
integer.label: Dilation Radius after deformation
integer.description: Radius of the structure element for dilation
